original_text: The history book included a report of how two of the king's eunuchs wanted to kill King Xerxes. Their names were Bigthana and Teresh. The report said that Mordecai had told the king about this.
korean_text: 그 속에 기록하기를 문을 지키던 왕의 두 내시 빅다나와 데레스가 아하수에로 왕을 암살하려는 음모를 모르드개가 고발하였다 하였는지라

sentences.original_text: The history book included a report
of how two of the king's eunuchs wanted to kill King Xerxes
sentences.korean_translation: 왕의 두 내시가 크셀크세스 왕을 죽이려 했다는 사실에 대한

sentences.original_text: Their names were Bigthana and Teresh
The report said that Mordecai had told the king about this
sentences.korean_translation: 그 보고서는 모르드개가 왕에게 이 사실을 알렸다고 말했습니다
